import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useGlobalContext } from "../../context/context"; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import toast from "react-hot-toast"; const EditModel = ({ data }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); console.log(data); const { setLoading, url, fetchJobData } = useGlobalContext(); const initialState = { jobTitle: data.jobTitle, empType: data.empType, department: data.department, desc: data.desc, closingDate: data.closingDate, quantity: data.quantity, status: data.status, }; const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const updateJobData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); try { setLoading(true); const res = await axios.put(`${url}/job/${data._id}`, formData); console.log(res.data); setLoading(false); toast.success("Job Updated Successfully"); // navigate(`/recruitment/jobs`); fetchJobData(); } catch (error) { toast.error("Something went wrong! Try again later"); setLoading(false); } }; const resetForm = () => { setFormData(initialState); }; return (
